GK19bhattiku:2329: Bhk_12.84-1 krīḍan bhujaṅgena gṛhā'nupātaṃ kaścid yathā jīvati
GK19bhattiku:2331: Bhk_12.84-2 saṃsevamāno nṛ-patiṃ pra-mūḍhaṃ tathaiva yaj jīvati, so 'sya
GK19bhattiku:2333: Bhk_12.85-1 dattaḥ sva-doṣair bhavatā prahāraḥ pādena dharmye pathi me
GK19bhattiku:2335: Bhk_12.85-2 sa cintanīyaḥ saha mantri-mukhyaiḥ kasyā ''vayor
GK19bhattiku:2347: Bhk_13.2-1 baddho vāsara-saṅge bhīmo rāmeṇa lavaṇa-salilā''vāse
GK19bhattiku:2350: Bhk_13.3-2 āruḍhā saṃdehaṃ rāme sa-mahī-dhāra mahī sa-phaṇi-sabhā.
GK19bhattiku:2362: Bhk_13.8-1 praṇipatya tato vacanaṃ jagāda hitamāyato patir vārīṇām
GK19bhattiku:2365: Bhk_13.9-1 "tuṅgā giri-vara-dehā, a-gamaṃ salilaṃ, samīraṇo rasa-hārī,
GK19bhattiku:2366: Bhk_13.9-2 a-himo ravi-kiraṇa-gaṇo, māyā saṃsāra-kāraṇaṃ te paramā.
GK19bhattiku:2373: Bhk_13.12-2 taru-hariṇā giri-jālaṃ vahantu giri-bhāra-saṃsahā guru-deham.
GK19bhattiku:2376: Bhk_13.13-2 chindantu rāma-bāṇā gambhīre me jale mahā-giri-baddhe.
GK19bhattiku:2378: Bhk_13.14-2 hantuṃ bahu-bāhu-balaṃ hari-kariṇo giri-varoru-dehaṃ sahasā.
GK19bhattiku:2380: Bhk_13.15-1 jigamiṣayā saṃyuktā bahūva kapi-vāhinī mate dāśaratheḥ Bhk_13.15-2 buddha-jalā''laya-cittā
GK19bhattiku:2398: Bhk_13.21-1 uccakhnuḥ parirabdhān kapi-saṅghā bāhubhis tato bhūmi-bhṛtaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2400: sarvaṃ niravadyam Bhk_13.22-1 tuṅga-mahā-giri-subharā bāhu-samāruddha-bhidura-ṭaṅkā bahudhā
GK19bhattiku:2412: Bhk_13.26-1 tataḥ prāṇītāḥ kapi-yūtha-mukhyair nyastāḥ kṛśānos tanayena
GK19bhattiku:2417: Bhk_13.27-1 tene 'dri-bandhyo, vavṛdhe payodhis, tutoṣa rāmo, mumude
GK19bhattiku:2419: Bhk_13.27-2 tatrāsa śatrur, dadṛśe suvelaḥ, prāpe jalānto, juhṛṣuḥ
GK19bhattiku:2422: Bhk_13.28-1 bhremur, vavalgur, nanṛtur, jajakṣur, juguḥ, samutpupluvire,
GK19bhattiku:2482: Bhk_13.48-1 te rāmeṇa sa-rabhasaṃ paritaralā hari-gaṇā raṇa-samārambhe
GK19bhattiku:2493: Bhk_14.1-2 vimohya māyā-maya-rāma-mūrdhnā sītāmanīkaṃ prajighāya yoddhum.
GK19bhattiku:2494: Bhk_14.2-1 kambūnatha samādadhmuḥ, koṇair bheryo nijaghnire,
GK19bhattiku:2495: Bhk_14.2-2 veṇūn pupūrire, guñjā juguñjuḥ kara-ghaṭṭitāḥ
GK19bhattiku:2496: Bhk_14.3-1 vādayāṃcakrire ḍhakkāḥ, paṇavā dadhvanur hatāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2497: Bhk_14.3-2 kāhalāḥ pūrayāṃcakruḥ, pūrṇāḥ peraś ca sasvanuḥ
GK19bhattiku:2498: Bhk_14.4-1 mṛdaṅgā dhīramāsvenur, hatair svene ca gomukhaiḥ
GK19bhattiku:2499: Bhk_14.4-2 ghaṇṭāḥ śiśiñjire dīrghaṃ, jahrāde paṭahair bhṛśam.
GK19bhattiku:2500: Bhk_14.5-1 hayā jiheṣire harṣād, gambhīraṃ jagajur gajāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2501: Bhk_14.5-2 saṃtrastāḥ karabhā reṭuś, cukuvuḥ patti-paṅktayaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2502: Bhk_14.6-1 turaṅgā-pusphuṭur bhītāḥ, pusphurur vṛṣabhāḥ param
GK19bhattiku:2503: Bhk_14.6-2 nāryaś cukṣubhire mamlur mumuhuḥ śuśucuḥ patīn.
GK19bhattiku:2504: Bhk_14.7-1 jagarjur, jahṛṣuḥ, śurā rejus tuṣṭuvire paraiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2507: Bhk_14.8-2 asīnudvavṛhur dīptān, gurvīruccikṣipur gadāḥ Bhk_14.9-1 śūlāni bhramayāṃcakrur, bāṇānādadire śubhān,
GK19bhattiku:2508: Bhk_14.9-2 bhremuś, cukurdire, resur vavalguś ca padātayaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2509: Bhk_14.10-1 amutpetuḥ kaśā-ghātai, raśmyākarṣair mamaṅgire Bhk_14.10-2 aśvāḥ, pradudruvur mokṣe raktaṃ nijagaruḥ śrame.
GK19bhattiku:2510: Bhk_14.11-1 gajānāṃ pradaduḥ śārīn, kambalān paritastaruḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2511: Bhk_14.11-2 tenuḥ kakṣāṃ, dhvajāṃś caiva samucchiśriyurucchikhān.
GK19bhattiku:2513: Bhk_14.12-2 ājaghnur mūrdhni bālāṃś ca cucumbuś ca suta-priyāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2515: Bhk_14.13-2 vavṛdhe śuśubhe caiṣāṃ mado, hṛṣṭaiś ca pupluve.
GK19bhattiku:2516: Bhk_14.14-1 mṛgāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ sasruḥ, śivāḥ samyag vavāśire,
GK19bhattiku:2517: Bhk_14.14-2 a-vāmaiḥ pusphure dehaiḥ, prasede citta-vṛttibhiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2522: Bhk_14.17-1 śuśrāva rāmas tat sarvaṃ, pratasthe ca sa-sainikaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2525: Bhk_14.18-2 namaścakāra devebhyaḥ parṇa-talpaṃ mumoca ca.
GK19bhattiku:2526: Bhk_14.19-1 cakāsāṃcakruruttasthur, nedurānaśire diśaḥ Bhk_14.19-2 vānarā, bhūdharān, redhur, babhañjuś, ca tatas tarūn.
GK19bhattiku:2527: Bhk_14.20-1 dadāla bhūr, nabho raktaṃ goṣpadapraṃ vavarṣa ca,
GK19bhattiku:2528: Bhk_14.20-2 mṛgāḥ prasasṛpur vāmaṃ, khagāś cukuvire'śubham.
GK19bhattiku:2529: Bhk_14.21-1 ulkā dadṛśire dīptā, ruruvuś cā'śivaṃ śivāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2530: Bhk_14.21-2 cakṣmāye ca mahī, rāmaḥ śaśaṅke cā'śubhā'gamam.
GK19bhattiku:2533: Bhk_14.23-1 nirāsū rākṣasā bāṇān, prajahuḥ śūla-paṭṭiśān
GK19bhattiku:2534: Bhk_14.23-2 asīṃś ca vāhayāṃcakruḥ pāśaiś cā''cakṛṣus tataiḥ
GK19bhattiku:2535: Bhk_14.24-1 bhallaiś ca bibhidus tīkṣṇair vividhus tomarais tathā.
GK19bhattiku:2536: Bhk_14.24-2 gadābhiś cūrṇayāṃcakruḥ, śitaiś cakraiś ca cicchiduḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2537: Bhk_14.25-1 vānarā muṣṭibhir jaghnur dadaṃśur daśanais tathā,
GK19bhattiku:2538: Bhk_14.25-2 nirāsuś ca girīṃs tuṅgān, drumān vicakarus tathā.
GK19bhattiku:2539: Bhk_14.26-1 lāṅgūlair loṭhayāṃcakrus, talair, ninyuś ca saṃkṣayam,
GK19bhattiku:2540: Bhk_14.26-2 nakhaiś cakṛtatuḥ, kruddhāḥ pipiṣuś ca kṣitau balāt.
GK19bhattiku:2543: Bhk_14.28-1 rakta-paṅke gajāḥ sedur, na pracakramire rathāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2544: Bhk_14.28-2 nimamajjus turaṅgāś ca, gantuṃ notsehire bhaṭāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2545: Bhk_14.29-1 koṭyā koṭyā pura-dvāramekaikaṃ rurughe dviṣām,
GK19bhattiku:2547: Bhk_14.30-1 tastanur, jahvalur, mamlur, jaglur, luluṭhire kṣatāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2548: Bhk_14.30-2 mumūrcchur, vavamū raktaṃ, tatṛṣuś cobhaye bhaṭāḥ
GK19bhattiku:2549: Bhk_14.31-1 sampātinā prajaṅghas tu yuyudhe, 'sau drumāhataḥ
GK19bhattiku:2550: Bhk_14.31-2 cakampe, tīva cukrośa, jīvanāśaṃ nanāśa ca.
GK19bhattiku:2552: Bhk_14.32-2 jambumālī jahau prāṇān grāvṇā mārutinā hataḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2554: Bhk_14.33-2 sugrīvaḥ praghasaṃ nebhe, bahūn rāmas tatarda ca.
GK19bhattiku:2556: Bhk_14.34-2 nīlaś cakarta cakreṇa nikumbhasya śiraḥ sphurat.
GK19bhattiku:2557: Bhk_14.35-1 virūpākṣo jahe prāṇais tṛḍhaḥ saumitri-patribhiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2559: Bhk_14.36-1 gadā śatru-jitā jighye, tāṃ pratīyeṣa vāli-jaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2560: Bhk_14.36-2 rathaṃ mamantha sa-hayaṃ śākhinā 'sya tato 'ṅgadaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2561: Bhk_14.37-1 tat karma vāli-putrasya dṛṣṭvā viśvaṃ visiṣmiye,
GK19bhattiku:2562: Bhk_14.37-2 saṃtresū rākṣasāḥ sarve, bahu mene ca rāghavaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2563: Bhk_14.38-1 sugrīvo mumude, devāḥ sādhvityūcuḥ saŌvismayāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2565: Bhk_14.39-1 hī citraṃ lakṣmaṇenode, rāvaṇiś ca tirodadhe
GK19bhattiku:2566: Bhk_14.39-2 vicakāra tato rāmaḥ śarān, saṃtatrasur dviṣaḥ Bhk_14.40-1 vibhinnā jughurur ghoraṃ, jakṣuḥ kravyā'śino hatān,
GK19bhattiku:2567: Bhk_14.40-2 cuṣcyota vraṇināṃ raktaṃ, chinnāś celuḥ kṣaṇaṃ bhujāḥ
GK19bhattiku:2568: Bhk_14.41-1 kṛttairapi dṛḍha-krodho vīra-vaktrair na tatyaje,
GK19bhattiku:2570: Bhk_14.42-1 rāghavo na dayāṃcakre, dadhur dhairyaṃ na kecana,
GK19bhattiku:2571: Bhk_14.42-2 mamre pataṅgavad vīrair hāheti ca vicukruśe.
GK19bhattiku:2572: Bhk_14.43-1 tirobabhūve sūryeṇa, prāpe ca niśayā ''spadam,
GK19bhattiku:2573: Bhk_14.43-2 jagrase kāla-rātrīva vānarān rākṣasāmś ca sā.
GK19bhattiku:2575: Bhk_14.44-2 ājuhuve tirobhūtaḥ parānīkaṃ, jahāsa ca.
GK19bhattiku:2576: Bhk_14.45-1 babādhe ca balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ, nijagrāha ca sāyakaiḥ
GK19bhattiku:2577: Bhk_14.45-2 utsasarja śarāṃs, te'sya sarpa-sāc ca prapedire.
GK19bhattiku:2578: Bhk_14.46-1 ācicāya sa taiḥ senāmācikāya ca rāghavau,
GK19bhattiku:2579: Bhk_14.46-2 babhāṇa ca, "na me māyāṃ jigāyendro'pi, kiṃ nṛbhiḥ".
GK19bhattiku:2580: Bhk_14.47-1 ācikyāte ca bhūyo 'pi rāghavau tena pannagaiḥ
GK19bhattiku:2581: Bhk_14.47-2 tau mumuhaturudvignau, vasudhāyāṃ ca petatuḥ
GK19bhattiku:2582: Bhk_14.48-1 tato rāmeti cakrandus, tresuḥ parididevire Bhk_14.48-2 niśaśvasuś ca senānyaḥ, procur dhigiti cā''tmanaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2583: Bhk_14.49-1 manyuṃ śekur na te roddhuṃ, nā 'sraṃ saṃrurudhuḥ patat,
GK19bhattiku:2584: Bhk_14.49-2 vividur nendrajin-mārgaṃ, parīyuś ca plavaṅgamāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2585: Bhk_14.50-1 dadhāvā 'dbhis tataś cakṣuḥ sugrīvasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2586: Bhk_14.50-2 vidāṃcakāra dhautā'kṣaḥ sa ripuṃ khe, nanarda ca.
GK19bhattiku:2587: Bhk_14.51-1 ujjugūre tataḥ śailaṃ hantumindrajitaṃ kapiḥ Bhk_14.51-2 vihāya rāvaṇis tasmādānaṃhe cā 'ntikaṃ pituḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2588: Bhk_14.52-1 ācacakṣe ca vṛttāntaṃ, prajaharṣa ca rāvanaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2590: Bhk_14.53-1 dhvajānuddudhuvus tuṅgān, māṃsaṃ cemur, jaguḥ, papuḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2591: Bhk_14.53-2 kāmayāṃcakrire kāntās, tatas tuṣṭā niśācarāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2592: Bhk_14.54-1 darśayāṃcakrire rāmaṃ sītāṃ rājñaś ca śāsanāt,
GK19bhattiku:2593: Bhk_14.54-2 tasyā mimīlatur netre, luluṭhe puṣpakodare.
GK19bhattiku:2594: Bhk_14.55-1 prāṇā dadhvaṃsire, gātraṃ tastambhe ca priye hate,
GK19bhattiku:2595: Bhk_14.55-2 ucchaśvāsa cirād dīnā, rurodā 'sau rarāsa ca.
GK19bhattiku:2596: Bhk_14.56-1 "lauha-bandhair babandhe nu, vajreṇa kiṃ vinirmame
GK19bhattiku:2597: Bhk_14.56-2 mano me, na vinā rāmād yat pusphoṭa sahasra-dhā.
GK19bhattiku:2598: Bhk_14.57-1 utteritha samudraṃ tvaṃ madarthe, 'rīn jihiṃsitha,
GK19bhattiku:2599: Bhk_14.57-2 mamartha cā'tighorāṃ māṃ dhig jīvita-laghūkṛtām.
GK19bhattiku:2600: Bhk_14.58-1 na jijīvā 'sukhī tātaḥ prāṇatā rahitas tvayā,
GK19bhattiku:2601: Bhk_14.58-2 mṛte'pi tvayi jīvantyā kiṃ mayā 'ṇakabhāryayā."
GK19bhattiku:2602: Bhk_14.59-1 sā jugupsān pracakre 'sūn, jagarhe lakṣaṇāni ca
GK19bhattiku:2603: Bhk_14.59-2 dehabhāñji, tataḥ keśān luluñca, luluṭhe muhuḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2604: Bhk_14.60-1 jaglau, dadhyau, vitastāna, kṣaṇaṃ prāṇa na, vivyathe,
GK19bhattiku:2605: Bhk_14.60-2 daivaṃ nininda, cakranda, dehe cā 'tīva manyunā.
GK19bhattiku:2606: Bhk_14.61-1 āśvāsayāṃcakārā 'tha trijaṭā tāṃ, nināya ca.
GK19bhattiku:2608: Bhk_14.62-1 ciceta rāgas tat kṛcchramoṣāṃcakre śucā 'tha saḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2609: Bhk_14.62-2 manyuś cā 'sya samāpipye, virurāva ca lakṣmaṇam.
GK19bhattiku:2610: Bhk_14.63-1 samīhe martumānarce tena vācā 'khilaṃ balam,
GK19bhattiku:2611: Bhk_14.63-2 āpapṛcche ca sugrīvaṃ svaṃ deśaṃ visasarja ca.
GK19bhattiku:2612: Bhk_14.64-1 ādideśa sa kiṣkindhāṃ rāghavau netumaṅgadam,
GK19bhattiku:2613: Bhk_14.64-2 pratijajñe svayaṃ caiva sugrīvo rakṣasā vadham.
GK19bhattiku:2615: Bhk_14.65-2 vibhīṣaṇāditi śrutvā taṃ nidadhyau raghūttamaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2617: Bhk_14.66-2 vṛkṣebhyaś cucyute puṣpair, virejur bhāsurā diśaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2618: Bhk_14.67-1 jagāhire 'mbudhiṃ nāgā, vavau vāyur mano-ramaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2620: Bhk_14.68-1 bhrejire 'kṣata-vad yodhā, lebhe saṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2621: Bhk_14.68-2 vibhīṣaṇo 'pi babhrāje, garutmān prāpa cā 'ntikam
GK19bhattiku:2622: Bhk_14.69-1 saṃpasparśā 'tha kākutsthau, jajñāte tau gata-vyathau
GK19bhattiku:2625: Bhk_14.70-2 vānarā dadramuś cā 'tha saṃgrāmaṃ cā''śaśāśire.
GK19bhattiku:2626: Bhk_14.71-1 ḍuḍhaukire punar laṅkāṃ, bubudhe tān daśānanaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2627: Bhk_14.71-2 jīvataś ca vivedā 'rīn, babhraṃśe 'sau dhṛtes tataḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2628: Bhk_14.72-1 sasraṃse śara-bandhena divyeneti bubunda saḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2629: Bhk_14.72-2 babhājā 'tha paraṃ mohamūhāṃcakre jayaṃ na ca.
GK19bhattiku:2631: Bhk_14.73-2 siṃhā''syair yuyuje tasya vṛkā''syaiś ca rathaḥ khagaiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2634: Bhk_14.75-1 adhyuvāsa rathaṃ, teye purāc, cukṣāva cā 'śubham,
GK19bhattiku:2636: Bhk_14.76-1 nililye mūrdhni gṛdhro'sya, krūrā dhvāṅkṣā vivāśire,
GK19bhattiku:2637: Bhk_14.76-2 śiśīke śoṇitaṃ vyoma, cacāla kṣmā-talaṃ tathā.
GK19bhattiku:2638: Bhk_14.77-1 tataḥ prajaghaṭe yuddhaṃ, śastrāṇyāsuḥ parasparam,
GK19bhattiku:2639: Bhk_14.77-2 vavraścurājughūrṇuś, ca syemuś, cukūrdire tathā.
GK19bhattiku:2640: Bhk_14.78-1 rurujur, bhrejire, pheṇur, bahudhā hari-rākṣasāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2641: Bhk_14.78-2 vīrā na bibhayāṃcakrur, bhīṣayāṃcakrire parān.
GK19bhattiku:2642: Bhk_14.79-1 rattaṃ pracuścutuḥ kṣaṇṇāḥ, śiśviyur bāṇa-vikṣatāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2643: Bhk_14.79-2 asyatāṃ śuśuvur bāṇān bhujāḥ sā'ṅguṣṭha-muṣṭayaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2644: Bhk_14.80-1 raṇe cikrīḍa dhūmrākṣas, taṃ tatarjā'nilā''tmajaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2645: Bhk_14.80-2 ādade ca śilāṃ, sā'śvaṃ pipeṣā 'sya rathaṃ tayā.
GK19bhattiku:2646: Bhk_14.81-1 papāta rākṣaso bhūmau, rarāṭa ca bhayaṃkaram,
GK19bhattiku:2647: Bhk_14.81-2 tutoda gadayā cā'riṃ, taṃ dudhrāvā 'driṇā kapiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2648: Bhk_14.82-1 akampanas tato yoddhuṃ cakame rāvaṇā'jñayā,
GK19bhattiku:2650: Bhk_14.83-1 paspande tasya vāmā'kṣi, sasyamuś cā'śivāḥ khagāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2651: Bhk_14.83-2 tān vavrājā 'vamatyā 'sau, babhāse ca raṇe śaraiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2652: Bhk_14.84-1 khamūyur, vasudhāmūvuḥ sāyakā rajju-vat tatāḥ
GK19bhattiku:2653: Bhk_14.84-2 tasmād balairapatrepe, puprothā 'smai na kaścana.
GK19bhattiku:2654: Bhk_14.85-1 sa bhasma-sāc cakārā'rīn, dudāva ca kṛtānta-vat,
GK19bhattiku:2655: Bhk_14.85-2 cukrodha mārutis, tāla- muccakhne ca mahā-śikham.
GK19bhattiku:2657: Bhk_14.86-2 babhrajja nihate tasmin śoko rāvaṇamagnivat.

GK19bhattiku:2901: Bhk_15.98-2 niśā'nte rāvaṇiḥ kruddho rāghavau ca vyamūmuhat.
GK19bhattiku:2903: Bhk_15.99-2 aghorīc ca mahā-ghoraṃ, gatvā, praiṣīc ca rāvaṇam.
GK19bhattiku:2905: Bhk_15.100-2 apārīt sa gṛhītolko hata-śeṣān plavaṅgamān.
GK19bhattiku:2907: Bhk_15.101-2 avābuddha sa nīlā''dīn nihatān kapi-yūtha-pān.
GK19bhattiku:2908: Bhk_15.102-1 tatraiṣaj jāmbavān prāṇīdudamīlīc ca locane,
GK19bhattiku:2910: Bhk_15.103-1 tasya kṣeme mahā-rāja ! nā 'mṛṣmahyakhilā vayam.
GK19bhattiku:2911: Bhk_15.103-2 paulastyo 'śiśravat taṃ ca jīvantaṃ pavanā''tmajam.
GK19bhattiku:2912: Bhk_15.104-1 āyiṣṭa mārutis tatra, tau cā 'pyahṛṣatāṃ tataḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2916: Bhk_15.106-1 prodapāti nabhas tena, sa ca prāpi mahā-giriḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2918: Bhk_15.107-1 niracāyi yadā bhedo nauṣadhīnāṃ hanū-matā,
GK19bhattiku:2919: Bhk_15.107-2 sarva eva samāhāri tadā śailaḥ mahauṣadhiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2920: Bhk_15.108-1 prāṇiṣur nihatāḥ kecit, kecit tu prodamīliṣuḥ
GK19bhattiku:2923: Bhk_15.109-2 evaṃ te'cetiṣuḥ sarve, vīryaṃ cā'dhiṣatā'dhikam.
GK19bhattiku:2924: Bhk_15.110-1 ajihladat sa kākutsthau, śeṣāṃś cā 'jījivat kapīn
GK19bhattiku:2925: Bhk_15.110-2 hanūmānatha te laṅkā- magninā 'dīdipan drutam.
GK19bhattiku:2929: Bhk_15.112-2 nikumbhaś caiva kumbhaś ca, prāpatāṃ tau plavaṅgamān.
GK19bhattiku:2930: Bhk_15.113-1 agopiṣṭāṃ purīṃ laṅkāmagauptāṃ rakṣasāṃ balam,
GK19bhattiku:2932: Bhk_15.114-1 akokūyiṣṭa tat sainyaṃ, prapalāyiṣṭa cā''kulam,
GK19bhattiku:2933: Bhk_15.114-2 acyutac ca kṣataṃ raktaṃ, hataṃ cā 'dhyaśayiṣṭa gām.
GK19bhattiku:2935: Bhk_15.115-2 abhyārdīd vālinaḥ putraṃ prajaṅgho 'pi sa-matsaraḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2937: Bhk_15.116-2 ahārṣīc ca śiraḥ kṣipraṃ yūpākṣasya nirākulaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2938: Bhk_15.117-1 śarīraṃ lohitākṣasya nyabhāṅkṣīd dvividas tadā,
GK19bhattiku:2939: Bhk_15.117-2 kruddhaḥ kumbhas tato 'bhaitsīn maindaṃ sa-dvividaṃ śaraiḥ
GK19bhattiku:2940: Bhk_15.118-1 āghūrṇiṣṭāṃ kṣatau, kṣmāṃ ca tāvāśiśriyatāmubhau.
GK19bhattiku:2941: Bhk_15.118-2 mātulau vihvalau dṛṣṭvā kumbhaṃ vāli-suto nagaiḥ
GK19bhattiku:2945: Bhk_15.120-2 muṣṭinā kaumbhakarṇiṃ ca kruddhaḥ prāṇairatityajat.
GK19bhattiku:2946: Bhk_15.121-1 nikumbho vānarendrasya prāhaiṣīt parighaṃ tataḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2949: Bhk_15.122-2 grīvāṃ cā 'sya tathākrākṣīdajijīvad yathā na tam.
GK19bhattiku:2954: Bhk_16.1-1 tataḥ prarudito rājā rakṣasāṃ hata-bāndhavaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2955: Bhk_16.1-2 "kiṃ kariṣyāmi rājyena, sītayā kiṃ kariṣyate
GK19bhattiku:2956: Bhk_16.2-1 atikāye hate vīre protsahiṣye na jīvitum.
GK19bhattiku:2957: Bhk_16.2-2 hrepayiṣyati kaḥ śatrūn, kena jāyiṣyate yamaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2958: Bhk_16.3-1 atikāyād vinā pāśyaṃ ko vā chetsyati vāruṇam,
GK19bhattiku:2959: Bhk_16.3-2 rāvaṇaṃ maṃsyate ko vā, svayambhūḥ kasya tokṣyati.
GK19bhattiku:2960: Bhk_16.4-1 ślāghiṣye kena, ko bandhūn neṣyatyunnatimunnataḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2961: Bhk_16.4-2 kaḥ preṣyati pit n kāle, kṛtvā kitthaṣyate na kaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2962: Bhk_16.5-1 udyaṃsyati harir vajraṃ, vicariṣyati nir-bhayaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2963: Bhk_16.5-2 bhokṣyate yajña-bhāgāṃś ca śūra-mānaṃ ca vakṣyati.
GK19bhattiku:2964: Bhk_16.6-1 ravis tapsyati niḥ-śaṅkaṃ, vāsyatyaniyataṃ marut,
GK19bhattiku:2966: Bhk_16.7-1 tīvraṃ syandiṣyate meghairugraṃ vartiṣyate yamaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2967: Bhk_16.7-2 atikāyasya maraṇe kiṃ kariṣyanti nā'nyathā.
GK19bhattiku:2968: Bhk_16.8-1 anmīliṣyati cakṣur me vṛthā, yad vinayā''gatam
GK19bhattiku:2969: Bhk_16.8-2 ājñā-lābhonmukhaṃ namraṃ na drakṣyati narāntakam.
GK19bhattiku:2970: Bhk_16.9-1 dhiṅ māṃ, triśirasā nā 'haṃ sandarśiṣye 'dya yat punaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2971: Bhk_16.9-2 ghāniṣyante dviṣaḥ kena tasmin pañcatvamāgate.
GK19bhattiku:2972: Bhk_16.10-1 śatrubhir nihate matte drakṣye 'haṃ saṃyuge sukham,
GK19bhattiku:2973: Bhk_16.10-2 yuddhonmattād vinā śatrūn samāskantsyati ko raṇe.
GK19bhattiku:2974: Bhk_16.11-1 āhvāsyate vi-śaṅko māṃ yotsyamānaḥ śata-kratuḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2975: Bhk_16.11-2 prakalpsyati ca tasyā 'rtho nikumbe dur haṇe hate
GK19bhattiku:2976: Bhk_16.12-1 kalpiṣyate hareḥ prītir, laṅkā copahaniṣyate,
GK19bhattiku:2977: Bhk_16.12-2 devāntaka ! tvayā tyakto ripor yāsyāmi vaśyatām.
GK19bhattiku:2978: Bhk_16.13-1 mariṣyāmi, vijeṣye vā, hatāś cet tanayā mama,
GK19bhattiku:2979: Bhk_16.13-2 haniṣyāmi ripūṃs tūrṇaṃ, na jīviṣyāmi duḥkhitaḥ
GK19bhattiku:2980: Bhk_16.14-1 smeṣyante munayo, devāḥ kathayiṣyanti cā'niśam
GK19bhattiku:2983: Bhk_16.15-2 raṇe kartsyati gātrāṇi marmāṇi ca vitartsyati.
GK19bhattiku:2984: Bhk_16.16-1 patiṣyati kṣitau bhānuḥ, pṛthivī tolayiṣyate.
GK19bhattiku:2985: Bhk_16.16-2 nabhasvān bhaṅkṣyate vyoma muṣṭibhis tāḍayiṣyate.
GK19bhattiku:2986: Bhk_16.17-1 indroḥ syandiṣyate vahniḥ, samuccokṣyati sāgaraḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2987: Bhk_16.17-2 jalaṃ dhakṣyati, tigmāṃśoḥ syantyanti tamasāṃ cayāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:2988: Bhk_16.18-1 kumbhakarṇo raṇe puṃsā kruddhaḥ paribhaviṣyate Bhk_16.18-2 saṃbhāvitāni naitāni kadācit kenacij jane.
GK19bhattiku:2989: Bhk_16.19-1 kumbhakarṇe hate laṅkā- mārokṣyanti plavaṅgamāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:2990: Bhk_16.19-2 daṅkṣyanti rākṣasān, dṛptā bhaṅkṣyanti ca mamā ''śramān.
GK19bhattiku:2991: Bhk_16.20-1 cartsyanti bāla-vṛddhāṃś ca, nartsyanti ca mudā yutāḥ
GK19bhattiku:2992: Bhk_16.20-2 tena rākṣasa-mukhyena vinā tān ko nirotsyati.
GK19bhattiku:2993: Bhk_16.21-1 amarṣo me paraḥ, sītāṃ rāghavaḥ kāmayiṣyate,
GK19bhattiku:2994: Bhk_16.21-2 cyuta-rājyāt sukhaṃ tasmāt kiṃ kilā 'sāvavāpsyati.
GK19bhattiku:2996: Bhk_16.22-2 bhūmau vā nikhaniṣyāmi vidhvaṃsasyā 'sya kāraṇam
GK19bhattiku:2997: Bhk_16.23-1 nā 'nurotsye jagal-lakṣmīṃ, ghaṭiṣye jīvituṃ na vā
GK19bhattiku:2998: Bhk_16.23-2 na raṃsye viṣayaiḥ śūnye bhavane bāndhavairaham.
GK19bhattiku:2999: Bhk_16.24-1 modiṣye kasya saukhye 'haṃ, ko me modiṣyate sukhe,
GK19bhattiku:3000: Bhk_16.24-2 ādeyāḥ kiṃkṛte bhogāḥ kumbhakaṛṇa ! tvayā vinā.
GK19bhattiku:3001: Bhk_16.25-1 yāḥ suhṛtsu vipanneṣu māmupaiṣyanti saṃpadaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3002: Bhk_16.25-2 tāḥ kiṃ manyu-kṣatā''bhogā na vipatsu vipattayaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3005: Bhk_16.27-1 "arthena saṃbhṛtā rājñā na bhāṣiṣyāmahe vayam,
GK19bhattiku:3006: Bhk_16.27-2 saṃyotsyāmaha," ityetat prahastena ca bhāṣitam.
GK19bhattiku:3007: Bhk_16.28-1 mānuṣo nāma patkāṣī rājānaṃ puruṣā'śinām
GK19bhattiku:3009: Bhk_16.29-1 sannatsyāmyathavā yoddhuṃ, na koṣye sattva-hīna-vat,
GK19bhattiku:3010: Bhk_16.29-2 adya taprsyanti māṃsā'dā, bhūḥ pāsyatyari-śoṇitam.
GK19bhattiku:3013: Bhk_16.31-1 mantūyiṣyati yakṣendro, valgūyiṣyati no yamaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3015: Bhk_16.32-1 sukhaṃ svapsyanti rakṣāṃsi, bhramiṣyanti ca nirbhayam,
GK19bhattiku:3016: Bhk_16.32-2 na vikrokṣyanti rākṣasyo, narāṃś cā 'tsyanti harṣitāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3017: Bhk_16.33-1 prāṅ muhūrtāt prabhāte'haṃ bhaviṣyāmi dhruvaṃ sukhī
GK19bhattiku:3018: Bhk_16.33-2 āgāmini, tataḥ kāle yo dvitīyaḥ kṣaṇo'paraḥ
GK19bhattiku:3019: Bhk_16.34-1 tatra jetuṃ gamiṣyāmi tridaśendraṃ sahā'maram,
GK19bhattiku:3021: Bhk_16.35-1 tameva-vādinaṃ mūḍhamindrjit samupāgataḥ Bhk_16.35-2 "yuyutsiṣye 'hamityevaṃ vadan ripu-bhayaṃkaraḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3022: Bhk_16.36-1 nā 'bhijñā te mahārāja !, jeṣyāvaḥ śakra-pālitam
GK19bhattiku:3024: Bhk_16.37-1 nā 'bhijñā te, sa-yakṣendraṃ bhaṅkṣyāvo yad yamaṃ balāt,
GK19bhattiku:3025: Bhk_16.37-2 ratnāni cā ''hariṣyāvaḥ, prāpsyāvaś ca purīmimām.
GK19bhattiku:3026: Bhk_16.38-1 eṣa pekṣyāmyarīn bhūyo, na śociṣyasi rāvaṇa !
GK19bhattiku:3028: Bhk_16.39-1 saha-bhṛtyaḥ surā''vāse bhayaṃ bhūyo vidhāsyasi
GK19bhattiku:3029: Bhk_16.39-2 praṇaṃsyatyadya devendras tvāṃ, vakṣyati sa sannatim.
GK19bhattiku:3030: Bhk_16.40-1 bheṣyate munibhis tvattas tvamadhiṣṭhāsyasi dviṣaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3032: Bhk_16.41-1 jñāyiṣyante mayā cā 'dya vīraṃ-manyā dviṣad-gaṇāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3033: Bhk_16.41-2 gūhiṣyāmi kṣitiṃ kṛttai- radya gātrair vanākasām.
GK19bhattiku:3036: Bhk_16.42-2 śroṣyasyadya vikīrṇa-vṛkṇa-vimukha- vyāpanna-śatrau raṇe tṛptāṃś choṇita-śoṇa-bhīṣaṇamukhān kravyā'śinaḥ krośataḥ."
GK19bhattiku:3038: Bhk_17.1-2 viprānavācayan yodhāḥ, prākkurvan maṅgalāni ca.
GK19bhattiku:3040: Bhk_17.2-2 strīḥ samāvardhayan sā'srāḥ, kāryāṇi prādiśaṃs tathā.
GK19bhattiku:3041: Bhk_17.3-1 ācchādayan, vyalimpaṃś ca, prāśnannatha surā''miṣam,
GK19bhattiku:3042: Bhk_17.3-2 prāpiban madhu-mādhvīkaṃ bhakṣyāṃś cā ''dan yathepsitān
GK19bhattiku:3043: Bhk_17.4-1 nyaśyan śastrāṇyabhīṣṭāni, samanahyaṃś ca varmabhiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3044: Bhk_17.4-2 adhyāsata su-yāgāni, dviṣadbhyaś cā 'śapaṃs tathā.
GK19bhattiku:3046: Bhk_17.5-2 samālipata śakrā'rir yānaṃ cā 'bhyalaṣad varam.
GK19bhattiku:3048: Bhk_17.6-2 adhyāsta syandanaṃ ghoraṃ, prāvartata tataḥ puraḥ
GK19bhattiku:3049: Bhk_17.7-1 āghnan bherīr mahā-svānāḥ, kambūṃś cā 'pyadhaman śubhān,
GK19bhattiku:3050: Bhk_17.7-2 atāḍayan mṛdaṅgāṃś ca, perāś cā 'pūrayan kalāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3052: Bhk_17.8-2 anadan siṃhanādāṃś ca, prādrekata haya-dvipam.
GK19bhattiku:3055: Bhk_17.10-1 ārcchan vāmaṃ mṛgāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ, śastrāṇāṃ vyasmaran bhaṭāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3057: Bhk_17.11-1 na tānagaṇayan sarvānāskandaṃś ca ripūn, dviṣaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3061: Bhk_17.13-1 āsyan plavaṅgamā vṛkṣānadhunvan bhū-dharair bhṛśam,
GK19bhattiku:3065: Bhk_17.15-1 atṛṇeṭ śakra-jic chatrūnabhrāmyac ca samantataḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3066: Bhk_17.15-2 adhvanac ca mahā-ghoraṃ, na ca kaṃcana nā'dunot.
GK19bhattiku:3067: Bhk_17.16-1 nā'jānan sandadhānaṃ taṃ, dhanur naikṣanta bibhratam
GK19bhattiku:3072: Bhk_17.18-2 paryaśrāmyannatṛpyaṃś ca kṣatās tenā 'mriyanta ca.
GK19bhattiku:3075: Bhk_17.20-1 tato māyā-mayīṃ sītāṃ ghnan khaḍgena viyad-gataḥ
GK19bhattiku:3077: Bhk_17.21-1 "mā 'parādhnodiyaṃ kiṃcidabhraśyat patyurantikāt Bhk_17.21-2 sītāṃ rākṣasa ! mā smaināṃ nigṛhṇāḥ pāpa ! duḥkhitām"
GK19bhattiku:3078: Bhk_17.22-1 "pīḍā-karama-mitrāṇāṃ kartavyamiti śakrajit Bhk_17.22-2 abravīt, khaḍga-kṛṣṭaś ca tasyā mūrdhānamacchinat.
GK19bhattiku:3080: Bhk_17.23-2 sā hate"ti vadan rāmamupātiṣṭhan marut-sutaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3081: Bhk_17.24-1 tataḥ prāmuhyatāṃ vīrau rāghavāvarutāṃ tathā,
GK19bhattiku:3082: Bhk_17.24-2 uṣṇaṃ ca prāṇatāṃ dīrghamuccair vyākrośatāṃ tathā.
GK19bhattiku:3083: Bhk_17.25-1 tāvabhāṣata paulastyo "mā sma praruditaṃ yuvām,
GK19bhattiku:3085: Bhk_17.26-1 mā sma tiṣṭhata, tatra-stho vadhyo 'smāva-hutā'nalaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3087: Bhk_17.27-1 brahmā 'dadhād vadhaṃ tasya tasmin karmaṇyasaṃsthite"
GK19bhattiku:3088: Bhk_17.27-2 prāyacchadājñāṃ saumitrer yuthapānāṃ ca rāghavaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3089: Bhk_17.28-1 tāṃ pratyaicchan su-saṃpritās tatas te sa-vibhīṣaṇāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3090: Bhk_17.28-2 nikumbhilāṃ samabhyāyan, nyarudhyanta ca rākṣasaiḥ
GK19bhattiku:3091: Bhk_17.29-1 dik-pālaiḥ kadanaṃ tatra sene prākurutāṃ mahat,
GK19bhattiku:3092: Bhk_17.29-2 aitāṃ rakṣāṃsi nirjitya drutaṃ paulastya-lakṣmaṇau,
GK19bhattiku:3095: Bhk_17.31-1 adhyāyac chakrajid brahma, samādheracalan na ca.
GK19bhattiku:3097: Bhk_17.32-1 akupyadindrajit tatra, pitṛvyaṃ cā'gadad vacaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3099: Bhk_17.33-1 ihā 'jīva, ihaiva tvaṃ krūramārabhathāḥ katham,
GK19bhattiku:3100: Bhk_17.33-2 nā'paśyaḥ pāṇimārdraṃ tvaṃ, bandhu-tvaṃ nā'pyapaikṣathāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3101: Bhk_17.34-1 a-dharmān nā 'trasaḥ pāpa ! loka-vādān na cā 'bibheḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3102: Bhk_17.34-2 dharma-duṣaṇa ! nūnaṃ tvaṃ nā 'jānā, nā 'śṛṇoridam.
GK19bhattiku:3103: Bhk_17.35-1 nirākṛtya yathā bandhūn laghu-tvaṃ yātya-saṃśayam."
GK19bhattiku:3105: Bhk_17.36-1 "mithyā mā sma vyatikrāmo, macchīlaṃ mā na badhyathāh
GK19bhattiku:3106: Bhk_17.36-2 satyaṃ samabhavaṃ vaṃśe pāpānāṃ rakṣasāmaham.
GK19bhattiku:3107: Bhk_17.37-1 na tvajāyata me śīlaṃ tādṛk, yādṛk pitus tava.
GK19bhattiku:3111: Bhk_17.39-1 vyajighṛkṣat surān nityaṃ, prāmādyad guṇināṃ hite,
GK19bhattiku:3113: Bhk_17.40-1 doṣairaramataibhis te pitā 'tyajyata yair mayā.
GK19bhattiku:3116: Bhk_17.41-2 rāvaṇis tasya saumitriramathnāc caturo hayān.
GK19bhattiku:3117: Bhk_17.42-1 sāgarathiṃ cā 'lunād bāṇairabhanak syandanaṃ tathā,
GK19bhattiku:3118: Bhk_17.42-2 saumitrimakirad bāṇaiḥ parito rāvaṇis tataḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3119: Bhk_17.43-1 tāvasphāvayatāṃ śāktiṃ, bāṇāṃś cā'kiratāṃ muhuḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3122: Bhk_17.44-2 āsuraṃ rākṣasaḥ śastraṃ tato ghoraṃ vyasarjayat,
GK19bhattiku:3126: Bhk_17.46-2 tenā''gamyata ghoreṇa, śiraś cā 'hriyata dviṣaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3128: Bhk_17.47-2 paryaṣvajata saumitriṃ, mūrdhnyajighrac ca rāghavaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3130: Bhk_17.48-2 maithilyai cā 'śapaddhantuṃ tāṃ prākramata cā''turaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3132: Bhk_17.49-2 nyarundhaṃś cā 'sya panthānaṃ bandhutā śucamāruṇat.
GK19bhattiku:3135: Bhk_17.51-1 agnīnavarivasyaṃś ca te, 'namasyaṃś ca śaṅkaram,
GK19bhattiku:3138: Bhk_17.52-2 aśrūyata sa puṇyāhaḥ svasti-ghoṣaḥ samuccaran.
GK19bhattiku:3139: Bhk_17.53-1 yoddhāro 'bibharuḥ śāntyai sā'kṣataṃ vāri mūrdhabhiḥ,

GK19bhattiku:3141: Bhk_17.54-1 adihaṃś candanaiḥ śubhrair, vicitraṃ samavastrayan,
GK19bhattiku:3142: Bhk_17.54-2 adhārayan srajaḥ kāntā, varma cā 'nye 'dadhur drutam.
GK19bhattiku:3146: Bhk_17.56-2 apūryanta ca dig-bhāgās tumulais tūrya-nisvanaiḥ.

GK19bhattiku:3158: Bhk_17.62-2 samapadyata raktena samantāt tena kardamaḥ.

GK19bhattiku:3162: Bhk_17.64-2 rāmaḥ, samīhitaṃ tasya nā'cetan sve na cā 'pare.

GK19bhattiku:3168: Bhk_17.67-2 caturdaśa sahasrāṇi sā''rohāṇāṃ ca vājinām Bhk_17.68-1 lakṣe ca dve padātīnāṃ rāghaveṇa dhanur-bhṛtā
GK19bhattiku:3171: Bhk_17.69-2 śailairivā 'cinod bhūmiṃ bṛhadbhī rākṣasair hataiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3172: Bhk_17.70-1 astuvan deva-gandharvā, vyasmayanta plavaṅgamāḥ Bhk_17.70-2 kapīndre'tanyata prītiḥ, paulastyo'manyatā'dbhutam.
GK19bhattiku:3174: Bhk_17.71-2 amuhyad bāla-vṛddhaṃ ca, samarauditaro janaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3175: Bhk_17.72-1 sarvataś cā'bhayaṃ prāpnon naicchan nṛbhyas tu rāvaṇaḥ,

GK19bhattiku:3179: Bhk_17.74-1 meghāḥ sa-vidyuto 'varṣaṃś cela-knopaṃ ca śoṇitam,
GK19bhattiku:3180: Bhk_17.74-2 avān bhīmā nabhasvantaḥ, prāruvanna-śivāḥ śivāḥ
GK19bhattiku:3183: Bhk_17.76-1 vyanāśayaṃs tataḥ śatrūn sugrīvā'stā mahībhṛtaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3185: Bhk_17.77-1 āścyotad rudhiraṃ, toyamalasac cā'ti vihvalam,
GK19bhattiku:3187: Bhk_17.78-1 virūpākṣas tato krīḍat saṃgrāme matta-hastinā,
GK19bhattiku:3189: Bhk_17.79-1 acūrṇayac ca yūpākṣaṃ śilayā tadanantaram.
GK19bhattiku:3191: Bhk_17.80-1 tato 'kuṣṇād daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ prāṇān vanaukasām,
GK19bhattiku:3192: Bhk_17.80-2 agopāyac ca rakṣāṃsi diśaś cā 'rīnabhājayat.
GK19bhattiku:3195: Bhk_17.82-1 āskandal lakṣmaṇaṃ bānairatyakrāmac ca taṃ drutam,
GK19bhattiku:3197: Bhk_17.83-1 apauhad bāṇa-varṣaṃ tad bhallai rāmo nirākulaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3200: Bhk_17.84-2 jagad vismāpayetāṃ tau, na ca vīrāvasīdatām.
GK19bhattiku:3201: Bhk_17.85-1 vyoma prācinutāṃ bāṇaiḥ, kṣmāmakṣmāpayatāṃ gataiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3202: Bhk_17.85-2 abhittāṃ tūrṇamanyonyaṃ śikṣāś cā 'tanutāṃ muhuḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3204: Bhk_17.86-2 tadakṣaran mahāsarpān vyāghra-siṃhāṃś ca bhīṣaṇān.
GK19bhattiku:3205: Bhk_17.87-1 nyaṣedhat pāvakā'streṇa rāmas tad rākṣasas tataḥ
GK19bhattiku:3207: Bhk_17.88-1 gāndharveṇa nyavidyat tat kṣitīndro, 'tha narā'śanaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3208: Bhk_17.88-2 sarva-marmasu kākutstha- maumbhat tīkṣṇaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
GK19bhattiku:3209: Bhk_17.89-1 tatas triśirasaṃ tasya prāvṛścal lakṣmaṇo dhvajam,
GK19bhattiku:3210: Bhk_17.89-2 amathnāt sārathiṃ cā''śu, bhūribhiś cā 'tudaccharaiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3211: Bhk_17.90-1 aśvān vibhīṣano 'tubhnāt syandanaṃ cā'kṣiṇod drutam,
GK19bhattiku:3212: Bhk_17.90-2 nā'kṣubhnād rākṣaso, bhrātuḥ śaktiṃ codavṛhad gurum.
GK19bhattiku:3214: Bhk_17.91-2 aśabdāyanta paśyantas tataḥ kruddho niśācaraḥ Bhk_17.92-1 aṣṭa-ghaṇṭāṃ mahā-śaktimudayacchan
GK19bhattiku:3215: Bhk_17.92-2 rāmā'nujaṃ tayā 'vidhyat, sa mahīṃ vyasurāśrayat.
GK19bhattiku:3217: Bhk_17.93-2 tatas tūrṇaṃ daśagrīvo raṇa-kṣmā paryaśeṣayat.
GK19bhattiku:3219: Bhk_17.94-2 asiñcadoṣadhīs tā yāḥ samānītā hanūmatā.
GK19bhattiku:3221: Bhk_17.95-2 sanyaṅ mūrdhanyupāśiṅgha- dapṛcchac ca nirāmayam
GK19bhattiku:3222: Bhk_17.96-1 tataḥ prodasahan sarve yoddhumabhyadravat parān,
GK19bhattiku:3226: Bhk_17.98-1 so 'dhyaṣṭhīyata rāmeṇa, śastraṃ pāśupataṃ tataḥ
GK19bhattiku:3228: Bhk_17.99-1 tataḥ śata-mahasreṇa rāmaḥ praurṇon niśācaram
GK19bhattiku:3229: Bhk_17.99-2 bāṇānāmakṣiṇod dhuryān, sārathiṃ cā'dunod drutam.
GK19bhattiku:3231: Bhk_17.100-2 rāvaṇaḥ prāhiṇocchūlaṃ, śaktiṃ caindīṃ mahī-patiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3233: Bhk_17.101-2 lakṣeṇa patriṇāṃ vakṣaḥ kruddho rāmasya rākṣasaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3236: Bhk_17.103-1 rākṣaso'tarjayat sūtaṃ punaś cā'ḍhaukayad ratham,
GK19bhattiku:3237: Bhk_17.103-2 nirāsyetāmubhaubāṇānubhau dhuryānavidhyatām Bhk_17.104-1 ubhāvakṛntatāṃ ketūnāvyathetāmubhau na tau
GK19bhattiku:3238: Bhk_17.104-2 adīpyetāmubhau dhṛṣṇū, prāyuñjātāṃ ca naipuṇam
GK19bhattiku:3239: Bhk_17.105-1 ubhau māyāṃ vyatāyetāṃ, vīrau nā 'śrāmyatāmubhau
GK19bhattiku:3246: Bhk_17.108-2 santrāsamabibhaḥ śakruḥ, praiṃkhacca, kṣubhitā kṣitiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3249: Bhk_17.110-1 nabhasvān yasya vājeṣu, phale tigmāṃśu-pāvakau
GK19bhattiku:3250: Bhk_17.110-2 gurutvaṃ meru-saṅkāśaṃ, dehaḥ sūkṣmo viyanmayaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3251: Bhk_17.111-1 rājitaṃ gāruḍaiḥ pakṣair viśveṣāṃ ghāma tejasām
GK19bhattiku:3252: Bhk_17.111-2 smṛtaṃ tad rāvaṇaṃ bhittvā sughoraṃ bhuvyaśāyayat.
GK19bhattiku:3253: Bhk_17.112-1 ābadhnan kapi-vadanāni saṃprasādaṃ, prāśaṃsat sura-samitir
GK19bhattiku:3255: Bhk_17.112-2 anyeṣāṃ vigata-pariplavā digantāḥ, paulastyo'juṣata śucaṃ
GK19bhattiku:3257: Bhk_18.1-1 vyaśnute sma tataḥ śoko nābhi-sambandha-sambhavaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3260: Bhk_18.2-2 nekṣate vihvalaṃ māṃ ca, na me vācaṃ prayacchati.
GK19bhattiku:3262: Bhk_18.3-2 tvaṃ tenā'bhihitaḥ pathyaṃ kiṃ kopaṃ na niyacchasi.
GK19bhattiku:3264: Bhk_18.4-2 tān, madān nā'vatiṣṭhante ye mate nyāyavādinām.
GK19bhattiku:3266: Bhk_18.5-2 priyaṃ, śṛṇoti yas tebhyas, tamṛcchanti na sampadaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3267: Bhk_18.6-1 prājñās tejasvinaḥ samyak paśyanti ca, vadanti ca,
GK19bhattiku:3268: Bhk_18.6-2 te'vajñātā mahārāja ! klāmyanti, viramanti, ca.
GK19bhattiku:3269: Bhk_18.7-1 leḍhi bheṣaja-van nityaṃ yaḥ pathyāni kaṭūnyapi,
GK19bhattiku:3270: Bhk_18.7-2 tadarthaṃ sevate cā ''ptān, kadācin na sa sīdati.
GK19bhattiku:3271: Bhk_18.8-1 sarvasya jāyate mānaḥ, sva-hitāc ca pramādyati,
GK19bhattiku:3272: Bhk_18.8-2 vṛddhau bhajati cā 'pathyaṃ naro yena vinaśyati.
GK19bhattiku:3273: Bhk_18.9-1 dveṣṭi prāyo guṇebhyo yan, na ca snihyati kasyacit,
GK19bhattiku:3274: Bhk_18.9-2 vairāyate mahadbhiś ca śīyate vṛddhimānapi.
GK19bhattiku:3275: Bhk_18.10-1 samāśvasimi kenā 'haṃ, kathaṃ prāṇimi dur-gataḥ
GK19bhattiku:3276: Bhk_18.10-2 loka-traya-patir bhrātā yasya me svapiti kṣitau Bhk_18.11-1 aho jāgarti kṛcchreṣu daivaṃ, yad bala-bhijjitaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3277: Bhk_18.11-2 luṭhyanti bhūmau klidyanti bāndhavā me svapanti ca.
GK19bhattiku:3278: Bhk_18.12-1 śivāḥ kuṣṇanti māṃsāni, bhūmiḥ pibati śoṇitam,

GK19bhattiku:3281: Bhk_18.13-2 tasyā'pīndrajito daivād dhvāṃkṣaiḥ śirasi līyate.
GK19bhattiku:3282: Bhk_18.14-1 svarbhānur bhāskaraṃ grastaṃ niṣṭīvati kṛtā'hnikaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3283: Bhk_18.14-2 abhyupaiti punar bhūtiṃ rāma-grasto na kaścana.

GK19bhattiku:3286: Bhk_18.16-1 mantre jātu vadantyajñās, tvaṃ tānapyanumanyase,
GK19bhattiku:3287: Bhk_18.16-2 kathaṃ nāma bhavāṃs tatra nā 'vaiti hitamātmanaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3288: Bhk_18.17-1 a-pṛṣṭo nu bravīti tvāṃ mantre mātāmaho hitam,

GK19bhattiku:3291: Bhk_18.18-2 purā tyajati yat kruddo māṃ nirākṛtya saṃsadi.
GK19bhattiku:3292: Bhk_18.19-1 havir jakṣiti niḥśaṅko makheṣu madhavānasau,
GK19bhattiku:3293: Bhk_18.19-2 pravāti svecchayā vāyurudgacchati ca bhāskaraḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3294: Bhk_18.20-1 dhanānāmīśate yakṣā, yamo dāmyati rākṣasān,
GK19bhattiku:3297: Bhk_18.21-2 no namasyanti te bandhūn, varivasyanti nā 'marāḥ
GK19bhattiku:3298: Bhk_18.22-1 śrīr niṣkuṣyati laṅkāyāṃ, virajyanti samṛddhayaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3299: Bhk_18.22-2 na veda tan, na yasyā'sti mṛte tvayi viparyayaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3300: Bhk_18.23-1 śaktiṃ saṃsvajate śakro, gopāyati hariḥ śriyam,
GK19bhattiku:3303: Bhk_18.24-2 cakāsati ca, māṃsā'dāṃ tathārandhreṣu jāgrati.
GK19bhattiku:3305: Bhk_18.25-2 bhūmayanti sva-sāmarthyaṃ, kīrtiṃ naḥ kanayanti ca.
GK19bhattiku:3306: Bhk_18.26-1 diśo vyaṣnuvate dṛptās tvat-kṛtāṃ jahati sthitim,
GK19bhattiku:3307: Bhk_18.26-2 kṣodayanti ca naḥ kṣudrā, hasanti tvāṃ vipad-gatam.
GK19bhattiku:3308: Bhk_18.27-1 śamaṃ śamaṃ nabhasvantaḥ punanti parito jagat,
GK19bhattiku:3309: Bhk_18.27-2 ujjihīṣe mahārāja ! tvaṃ praśānto na kiṃ punaḥ Bhk_18.28-1 prorṇoti śokas cittaṃ me, satvaṃ saṃśāmyatīva me
GK19bhattiku:3310: Bhk_18.28-2 pramārṣṭi duḥkhamālokaṃ, muñcāmyūrjaṃ tvayā vinā.
GK19bhattiku:3312: Bhk_18.29-2 viraumi śūnye, prorṇaumi kathaṃ manyu-samudbhavam.
GK19bhattiku:3315: Bhk_18.31-1 nedānīṃ śakra-yakṣendrau bibhīto, na daridritaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3316: Bhk_18.31-2 na garvaṃ jahito dṛptau, na kliśnīto daśā''nana !
GK19bhattiku:3317: Bhk_18.32-1 tvayā 'pi nāma rahitāḥ kāryāṇi tanumo vayam,
GK19bhattiku:3318: Bhk_18.32-2 kurmaś ca jīvite buddhiṃ, dhik tṛṣṇāṃ kṛta-nāśinīm.
GK19bhattiku:3319: Bhk_18.33-1 tṛṇehmi dehamātmīyaṃ. tvaṃ vācaṃ na dadāsi cet,
GK19bhattiku:3320: Bhk_18.33-2 drāghayanti hi me śokaṃ smaryamāṇā guṇās tava.
GK19bhattiku:3321: Bhk_18.34-1 unmucya srajamātmīyāṃ māṃ srajayati ko hasan,
GK19bhattiku:3322: Bhk_18.34-2 nedayatyāsanaṃ ko me, ko hi me vadati priyam.
GK19bhattiku:3323: Bhk_18.35-1 na gacchāmi purā laṅkā- māyur yāvad dadhāmyaham,
GK19bhattiku:3324: Bhk_18.35-2 kadā bhavati me prītis, tvāṃ paśyāmi na cedaham.
GK19bhattiku:3325: Bhk_18.36-1 ūrdhvaṃ mriye muhūrtāddhi vihvalaḥ kṣata-bāndhavaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3326: Bhk_18.36-2 mantre sma hitamākhyāmi, na karomi tavā 'priyam.
GK19bhattiku:3327: Bhk_18.37-1 antaḥpurāṇi paulastyaṃ paurāś ca bhṛśa-duḥkhitāḥ
GK19bhattiku:3328: Bhk_18.37-2 saṃśrutya smā 'bhidhāvanti hataṃ rāmeṇa saṃyuge.
GK19bhattiku:3329: Bhk_18.38-1 mūrdhajān sma viluñcanti, krośanti smā 'tivihvalam,
GK19bhattiku:3330: Bhk_18.38-2 adhīyantyupakārāṇāṃ muhur bhartuḥ pramanyu ca.
GK19bhattiku:3331: Bhk_18.39-1 rāvaṇasya namanti sma paurāḥ sāsrā rudanti ca."
GK19bhattiku:3332: Bhk_18.39-2 bhāṣate sma tato rāmo vacaḥ paulastyamākulamŌ

GK19bhattiku:3335: Bhk_18.41-1 bobhavīti na sammoho vyasane sma bhavādṛśām,
GK19bhattiku:3336: Bhk_18.41-2 kiṃ na paśyasi, sarvo 'yaṃ janas tvāmavalambate.
GK19bhattiku:3337: Bhk_18.42-1 tvamarhasi bhrāturanantarāṇi kartuṃ, janasyā 'sya ca
GK19bhattiku:3339: Bhk_18.42-2 dhurye vipanne tvayi rājya-bhāro majjatyanūḍhaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3341: Bhk_19.1-1 apa-manyus tato vākyaṃ paulastyo rāmamuktavānŌ
GK19bhattiku:3342: Bhk_19.1-2 "a-śocyo'pi vrajannastaṃ sanābhir dunuyān na kim.
GK19bhattiku:3343: Bhk_19.2-1 taṃ no devā vidheyāsur yena rāvaṇa-vad vayam
GK19bhattiku:3344: Bhk_19.2-2 sapatnāṃś ca 'dhijīyāsma, saṃgrāme ca mṛṣīmahi.
GK19bhattiku:3345: Bhk_19.3-1 kriyeraṃś ca daśā''syena yathā 'nyenā 'pi naḥ kule Bhk_19.3-2 devadyañco narā'hārā nyañcaśca dviṣatāṃ gaṇāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3346: Bhk_19.4-1 sa eva ghārayet prāṇānīdṛśe bandhu-viplave,
GK19bhattiku:3348: Bhk_19.5-1 mriyeyordhvaṃ muhūrtāddhi, na syās tvaṃ yadi me gatiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3349: Bhk_19.5-2 āśaṃsā ca hi naḥ, prete jīvema-daśamūrdhani.

GK19bhattiku:3351: Bhk_19.6-2 yatra viṃśati-hastasya na sodaryasya sambhavaḥ."
GK19bhattiku:3352: Bhk_19.7-1 āmantrayeta tān prahvān mantriṇo'tha vibhīṣaṇaḥŌ
GK19bhattiku:3353: Bhk_19.7-2 "gaccheta tvaritaṃ laṅkāṃ, rāja-veśma viśeta ca.
GK19bhattiku:3354: Bhk_19.8-1 ādadīdhvaṃ mahā'rhāṇi tatra vāsāṃsi sa-tvarāḥ
GK19bhattiku:3358: Bhk_19.10-1 uhyeran yajña pātrāṇi, hriyeta ca vibhāvasuḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3359: Bhk_19.10-2 bhriyeta cā''jyamṛtvigbhiḥ, kalpyeta ca samit-kuśam.
GK19bhattiku:3360: Bhk_19.11-1 snānīyaiḥ snāpayetā''śu, ramyair limpeta varṇakaiḥ,

GK19bhattiku:3365: Bhk_19.13-2 juhuyāc ca havir vahnau, gāyeyuḥ sāma sāmagāḥ."
GK19bhattiku:3366: Bhk_19.14-1 gatvā 'tha te purīṃ laṅkāṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathoditam
GK19bhattiku:3367: Bhk_19.14-2 samīpe'ntyā''huteḥ sā'srāḥ proktavanto vibhīṣaṇamŌ Bhk_19.15-1 "kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ, kartuṃ vahni-jala-kriyām
GK19bhattiku:3368: Bhk_19.15-2 prayatethā mahārāja ! saha sarvaiḥ sva-bandhubhiḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3369: Bhk_19.16-1 ajñā-van notsahethās tvaṃ, dheyā dhīra-tvama-cyutam,
GK19bhattiku:3370: Bhk_19.16-2 stheyāḥ kāryeṣu bandhūnāṃ, heyāḥ śokodbhavaṃ tamaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3371: Bhk_19.17-1 nā'vakalpyamidaṃ, glāyed yat kṛcchreṣu bhavānapi
GK19bhattiku:3372: Bhk_19.17-2 na pṛthag-jana-vaj jātu pramuhyet paṇḍito janaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3373: Bhk_19.18-1 yacca yatra bhavāṃs tiṣṭhet, tatrā 'nyo rāvaṇasya na,
GK19bhattiku:3374: Bhk_19.18-2 yacca yatra bhavān sīden mahadbhis tad vigarhitam.
GK19bhattiku:3375: Bhk_19.19-1 āścaryaṃ, yacca yatra tvāṃ prabrūyāma vayaṃ hitam,
GK19bhattiku:3376: Bhk_19.19-2 api sākṣāt praśiṣyās tvaṃ kṛcchreṣvindra-purohitam.
GK19bhattiku:3377: Bhk_19.20-1 kāmo janasyaŌ"jahyās tvaṃ pramādaṃ nairṛtā'dhipa !"
GK19bhattiku:3378: Bhk_19.20-2 uta dviṣo'nuśoceyur viplave, kimu bāndhavāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3379: Bhk_19.21-1 sa bhavān bhrātṛ-vad rakṣed yathāvadakhilaṃ janam,
GK19bhattiku:3380: Bhk_19.21-2 na bhavān saṃpramuhyec cedāśvasyuś ca niśācarāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3381: Bhk_19.22-1 tataḥ sa gatavān kartuṃ bhrāturagni-jala-kriyām.
GK19bhattiku:3382: Bhk_19.22-2 proktavān kṛta-kartavyaṃ vaco rāmo'tha rākṣasam.
GK19bhattiku:3383: Bhk_19.23-1 ambhāṃsi rukma-kumbhena siñcan mūrdhi samādhimānŌ
GK19bhattiku:3384: Bhk_19.23-2 "tvaṃ rājā rakṣasāṃ laṅkā- mavekṣethā vibhīṣana ?
GK19bhattiku:3386: Bhk_19.24-2 mānino mānayeḥ kāle, trastān paulastya ! sāntvayeḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3387: Bhk_19.25-1 icchā me paramā, nandeḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ vṛtra-śatru-vat,
GK19bhattiku:3388: Bhk_19.25-2 iccheddhi suhṛdaṃ sarvo vṛddhi-saṃsthaṃ yataḥ suhṛt.
GK19bhattiku:3389: Bhk_19.26-1 vardhiṣīṣṭāḥ svajāteṣu, vadhyās tvaṃ ripu-saṃhatīḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3390: Bhk_19.26-2 bhūyās tvaṃ guṇināṃ mānyas, teṣāṃ stheyā vyavasthitau.
GK19bhattiku:3391: Bhk_19.27-1 dheyās tvaṃ suhṛdāṃ prītiṃ, vandiṣīṣṭhā divaukasaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3392: Bhk_19.27-2 somaṃ peyāś ca, heyāś ca hiṃsrā hāni-karīḥ kriyāḥ
GK19bhattiku:3393: Bhk_19.28-1 avaseyāś ca kāryāṇi dharmeṇa pura-vāsinām,
GK19bhattiku:3394: Bhk_19.28-2 anurāgaṃ kriyā rājan ! sadā sarva-gataṃ jane.
GK19bhattiku:3395: Bhk_19.29-1 ghāniṣīṣṭa tvayā manyur, grāhiṣīṣṭa samunnatiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3396: Bhk_19.29-2 rakṣobhir darśiṣīṣṭhās tvaṃ, drakṣīran bhavatā ca te.
GK19bhattiku:3397: Bhk_19.30-1 manyuṃ vadhyā bhaṭa-vadha-kṛtaṃ bāla-vṛddhasya rājan !,
GK19bhattiku:3398: śāstrā'bhijñāḥ sadasi su-dhiyaḥ sannidhiṃ te kriyāsuḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3402: Bhk_20.1-2 diṣṭyā vardhasva vaidehi ! hatas trailokya-kaṇṭakaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3404: Bhk_20.2-2 rakṣikās tava rākṣasyo, gṛhāṇaitāsu matsaram.
GK19bhattiku:3406: Bhk_20.3-2 hiṃsrā bhavatu te buddhiretās, kuru niṣṭhuram.
GK19bhattiku:3407: Bhk_20.4-1 paścimaṃ karavāmaitat priyaṃ devi ! vayaṃ tava,"
GK19bhattiku:3408: Bhk_20.4-2 tataḥ proktavatī sītā vānaraṃ karuṇā''śayā.
GK19bhattiku:3411: Bhk_20.6-1 na hi preṣya-vadhaṃ ghoraṃ karavānyastu te matiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3412: Bhk_20.6-2 edhi kārya-karas tvaṃ me gatvā pravada rāghavam.
GK19bhattiku:3414: Bhk_20.7-2 tatheti sa pratijñāya gatvā rāghavamuktavān.
GK19bhattiku:3416: Bhk_20.8-2 kṣmāṃ likhitvā viniśvasya svarā''lokya vibhīṣaṇam
GK19bhattiku:3418: Bhk_20.9-2 gatvā praṇamya tenoktā maithilī madhuraṃ vacaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3419: Bhk_20.10-1 "jahīhi śokāṃ vaidehi ! prītaye dhehi mānasam,
GK19bhattiku:3420: Bhk_20.10-2 rāvaṇe jahihi dveṣāṃ, jahāhi pramadā-vanam.
GK19bhattiku:3421: Bhk_20.11-1 snāhyanulimpa dhūpāya, nivassvā''vidhya ca srajam,
GK19bhattiku:3422: Bhk_20.11-2 ratnānyā''muñca, saṃdīpte havir juhudhi pāvake,
GK19bhattiku:3423: Bhk_20.12-1 addhi tvaṃ pañca-gavyaṃ ca, chindhi saṃrodha-jaṃ tamaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3424: Bhk_20.12-2 āroha śibikāṃ haimīṃ, dviṣāṃ jahi mano-rathān.
GK19bhattiku:3425: Bhk_20.13-1 tṛṇeḍhu tvad-viyogotthāṃ rājanyānāṃ patiḥ śucam,
GK19bhattiku:3427: Bhk_20.14-1 dīkṣasva saha rāmeṇa tvaritaṃ turagā'dhvare,
GK19bhattiku:3428: Bhk_20.14-2 dṛśyasva patyā prītena prītyā prekṣasva rāghavam.
GK19bhattiku:3429: Bhk_20.15-1 ayaṃ niyogaḥ patyus te, kāryā nā'tra vicāraṇā,
GK19bhattiku:3430: Bhk_20.15-2 bhūṣayā 'ṅgaṃ, pramāṇaṃ ced, rāmaṃ gantuṃ yatasva ca
GK19bhattiku:3431: Bhk_20.16-1 mudā saṃyuhi kākutsthaṃ, svayaṃ cā ''pnūhi sampadam,
GK19bhattiku:3432: Bhk_20.16-2 upehyūrdhvaṃ muhūrtāt tvaṃ devi ! rāghava-sannidhim.
GK19bhattiku:3433: Bhk_20.17-1 ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtādahno 'ṅga ! svāminī sma bhava kṣiteḥ
GK19bhattiku:3435: Bhk_20.18-1 uttiṣṭhasva mate patyur, yatasvā 'laṅkṛtau tathā,
GK19bhattiku:3436: Bhk_20.18-2 pratiṣṭhasva ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ draṣṭavyaṃ tvaṃ mahī-patim."
GK19bhattiku:3440: Bhk_20.20-2 sā'srā gatvā 'ntikaṃ patyur dīnā ruditavatyasau.
GK19bhattiku:3444: Bhk_20.22-2 matiṃ badhāna sugrīve , rākṣasendraṃ gṛhāṇa vā.
GK19bhattiku:3445: Bhk_20.23-1 aśāna bharatād bhogān, lakṣmaṇaṃ pravṛṇīṣva vā,
GK19bhattiku:3446: Bhk_20.23-2 kāmād vā yāhi, mucyantāmāśā rāma-nibandhanāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3447: Bhk_20.24-1 kva ca khyāto raghor vaṃśaḥ, kva taṃ para-gṛhoṣitā,
GK19bhattiku:3448: Bhk_20.24-2 anyasmai hṛdayaṃ dehi, nā 'nabhīṣṭe ghaṭāmahe.
GK19bhattiku:3449: Bhk_20.25-1 yatheṣṭaṃ cara vaidehi !, panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3450: Bhk_20.25-2 kāmās te'nyatra tāyantāṃ viśaṅkāṃ tyaja mad-gatām.
GK19bhattiku:3451: Bhk_20.26-1 tataḥ pragaditā vākyaṃ maithilā'bhijanā nṛpamŌ
GK19bhattiku:3453: Bhk_20.27-1 daivād bibhīhi kākutstha ! jihrīhi tvaṃ tathā janāt,
GK19bhattiku:3454: Bhk_20.27-2 mithyā māmabhisaṃkrudhya- nna-vaśāṃ śatruṇā hṛtām.
GK19bhattiku:3455: Bhk_20.28-1 cetasas tvayi vṛttir me, śarīraṃ rakṣasā hṛtam,
GK19bhattiku:3456: Bhk_20.28-2 vidāṃkurvantu samyañco devāḥ satyamidaṃ vacaḥ Bhk_20.29-1 tvaṃ punīhi punīhīti punan vāyo ! jagatŌtrayam
GK19bhattiku:3457: Bhk_20.29-2 caran deheṣu bhūtānāṃ viddhi me buddhi-viplavam.
GK19bhattiku:3459: Bhk_20.30-2 yūyamāpo ! vijānīta mano-vṛttiṃ śubhāṃ mama.
GK19bhattiku:3460: Bhk_20.31-1 jaganti dhatsva dhatsveti dadhatī tvaṃ vasundhare !
GK19bhattiku:3462: Bhk_20.32-1 rasān saṃhara, dīpyasva, dhvāntaṃ jahi, nabho bhrama,
GK19bhattiku:3463: Bhk_20.32-2 itīhamānas tigmāṃ'śo ! vṛttaṃ jñātuṃ ghaṭasva me.
GK19bhattiku:3464: Bhk_20.33-1 svarge vidyasva, bhuvyā''sva, bhujaṅga-nilaye bhava,
GK19bhattiku:3465: Bhk_20.33-2 evaṃ vasan mamā ''kāśa ! saṃbudhyasva kṛtā'kṛtam.
GK19bhattiku:3466: Bhk_20.34-1 citāṃ kuru ca saumitre ! vyasanasyā 'sya bheṣajam,
GK19bhattiku:3467: Bhk_20.34-2 rāmas tuṣyatu me vā 'dya, pāpāṃ pluṣṇātu vā 'nalaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3469: Bhk_20.35-2 dṛṣṭvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya rāmaṃ pragaditā vacaḥ Bhk_20.36-1 pravapāṇi vapur vahnau rāsā 'haṃ śāṅkitā tvayā,
GK19bhattiku:3470: Bhk_20.36-2 sarve vidantu śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sa plavaṅgamāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3471: Bhk_20.37-1 māṃ duṣṭāṃ jvalita-vapuḥ pluṣāṇa vahne ! saṃrakṣa
GK19bhattiku:3473: Bhk_20.37-2 eṣā 'haṃ kratuṣu vasor yathā ''jya-dhārā tvāṃ prāptā vidhi-vadudīrṇa-dīpti-mālam.
GK19bhattiku:3474: Bhk_21.1-1 samutkṣipya tato vahnir maithilīṃ rāmamuktavān Bhk_21.1-2 "kākutstha ! dayitāṃ sādhvīṃ tvamāśaṅkiṣyathāḥ katham
GK19bhattiku:3475: Bhk_21.2-1 nā bhaviṣyadiyaṃ śuddhā yadyapāsyamahaṃ tataḥ Bhk_21.2-2 na caināṃ, pakṣapāto me dharmādanyatra rāghava !
GK19bhattiku:3476: Bhk_21.3-1 api tatra-ripuḥ sītāṃ nā 'rthayiṣyata dur-matiḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3477: Bhk_21.3-2 krūraṃ jātvavadiṣyac ca jātvastoṣyacchriyaṃ svakām.
GK19bhattiku:3478: Bhk_21.4-1 saṅkalpaṃ nā 'kariṣyac ca tatreyaṃ śuddha-mānasā,
GK19bhattiku:3480: Bhk_21.5-1 tvayā 'drakṣyata kiṃ nā 'syāḥ śīlaṃ saṃvasatā ciram,
GK19bhattiku:3481: Bhk_21.5-2 adarśiṣyanta vā ceṣṭāḥ kālena badhunā na kim.
GK19bhattiku:3484: Bhk_21.7-1 samapatsyata rājendra ! straiṇaṃ yadyatra cāpalam,
GK19bhattiku:3485: Bhk_21.7-2 loka-pālā ihā ''yāsyaṃs tato nā 'mī kali-druhaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3486: Bhk_21.8-1 āścaryaṃ yacca yatra strī kṛcchre 'vartsyan mate tava,

GK19bhattiku:3488: Bhk_21.9-1 yatra yaccā 'mariṣyat strī sādhvasād doṣa-varjitā
GK19bhattiku:3489: Bhk_21.9-2 tadasūyā-ratau loke tasyā vācyā ''spadaṃ mṛṣā.
GK19bhattiku:3490: Bhk_21.10-1 amaṃtsya bhavān yadvad tathaiva ca pitā tava
GK19bhattiku:3491: Bhk_21.10-2 nā ''gamiṣyad vimāna-sthaḥ sākṣād daśaratho nṛpaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3492: Bhk_21.11-1 nā 'kalpsyat sannidhiṃ sthānuḥ śūlī vṛṣabha-vāhanaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3495: Bhk_21.12-2 rājendra ! viśva-sūr dhātā cāritrye sītayā kṣate.
GK19bhattiku:3496: Bhk_21.13-1 praṇaman brahmaṇā prokto rājakā 'dhipatis tataḥ
GK19bhattiku:3497: Bhk_21.13-2 "nā, śotsyan maithilī loke, nā''cariṣyadidaṃ yadi.
GK19bhattiku:3498: Bhk_21.14-1 nā'mokṣyāma vayaṃ śaṅkā- mihādhāsyan na ced bhavān,
GK19bhattiku:3499: Bhk_21.14-2 kiṃ vā citramidaṃ yuktaṃ, bhavān yadakariṣyata.
GK19bhattiku:3501: Bhk_21.15-2 anuśāsye tvayā loke rāmā'vartsyaṃstarāṃ tataḥ

GK19bhattiku:3505: Bhk_21.17-2 ko vā viśvajanīneṣu karmasu prāghaṭiṣyata Bhk_21.18-1 daitya-kṣaye mahā-rāja ! yacca yatrā 'ghaṭiṣyathāḥ
GK19bhattiku:3506: Bhk_21.18-2 samāptiṃ jātu tatrāpi kiṃ nā 'neṣyas tvamīhitam.

GK19bhattiku:3508: Bhk_21.20-1 pretā vareṇa śakrasya prāṇantaḥ kapayas tataḥ

GK19bhattiku:3519: latās tarūṇām Bhk_21.23-2 sā ''modāḥ kṣiti-tala-saṃsthitā'valopyā bhokt ṇāṃ ṣramamadayaṃ
GK19bhattiku:3528: Bhk_22.4-2 darśitāras tvayā tāś ca malayopatyakāḥ śubhāḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3529: Bhk_22.5-1 pratanvyaḥ komalā vindhye sahitāraḥ syadaṃ na te
GK19bhattiku:3531: Bhk_22.6-1 draṣṭāsi prīti-mānārāt sakhibhiḥ saha sevitām
GK19bhattiku:3532: Bhk_22.6-2 sa-pakṣapātaṃ kiṣkindhāṃ pūrva-krīḍāṃ smaran muhuḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3534: Bhk_22.7-2 upadrutaś ciraṃ dvandvair yayoḥ kliśitavānaham.
GK19bhattiku:3537: Bhk_22.9-1 atikrāntā tvayā ramyaṃ duḥkhamatres tapo-vanam,
GK19bhattiku:3539: Bhk_22.10-1 tataḥ paraṃ bharadvājo bhavatā darśitā muniḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3540: Bhk_22.10-2 draṣṭāraś ca janāḥ punyā yāmunā'mbukṣatāṃ'hasaḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3541: Bhk_22.11-1 syantvā syantvā divaḥ śambhor- mūrdhni skantvā bhuvaṃ gatām
GK19bhattiku:3542: Bhk_22.11-2 gāhitāse 'tha puṇyasya gaṅgāṃ mūrtimiva drutām.
GK19bhattiku:3546: Bhk_22.13-2 vilokya sarayūṃ ramyāṃ gantā 'yodhyā tvayā purī.
GK19bhattiku:3547: Bhk_22.14-1 ānanditāras tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā praṣṭāraś cāvayoḥ śivam
GK19bhattiku:3548: Bhk_22.14-2 mātaraḥ saha maithilyā, toṣṭā ca bharataḥ param.
GK19bhattiku:3550: Bhk_22.15-2 sugrīvaṃ cā 'rjitaṃ mitraṃ, sarvāṃś cā''gāmukān drutam
GK19bhattiku:3551: Bhk_22.16-1 gantāraḥ paramāṃ prītiṃ paurāḥ ṣrutvā vacas tava,
GK19bhattiku:3552: Bhk_22.16-2 jñātvaitat sammukhīnaś ca sametā bharato dhruvam.
GK19bhattiku:3554: Bhk_22.17-2 labdhāhe 'haṃ dhṛtiṃ prāpte bhūyo bhavati sammukhe.
GK19bhattiku:3555: Bhk_22.18-1 gate tasmin gṛhītā 'rthe rāmaḥ sugrīva-rākṣasau
GK19bhattiku:3556: Bhk_22.18-2 uktavān śvo 'bhigantāstho yuvāṃ saha mayā puram.
GK19bhattiku:3557: Bhk_22.19-1 draṣṭāsthas tatra tisro me māt s tuṣṭa'ntarā''tmanaḥ
GK19bhattiku:3558: Bhk_22.19-2 āntyantīnaṃ sakhi-tvaṃ ca prāptāstho bharatā ''śrayam.
GK19bhattiku:3560: Bhk_22.20-2 śramo nubhavitā naivaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ ca viyoga-jaḥ,
GK19bhattiku:3561: Bhk_22.21-1 evaṃ yuvāṃ mama prītyai kalptāsthaḥ kapi-rākṣasau !
GK19bhattiku:3562: Bhk_22.21-2 gantuṃ prayatitāsāthe prātaḥ saha mayā yadi.
GK19bhattiku:3563: Bhk_22.22-1 utkavantau tato rāmaṃ vacaḥ paulastya-vānarau
GK19bhattiku:3564: Bhk_22.22-2 anugraho 'yaṃ kākutstha ! gantāsvo yat tvayā saha.
GK19bhattiku:3565: Bhk_22.23-1 anumantāsvahe nā''vāṃ bhavantaṃ virahaṃ tvayā
GK19bhattiku:3566: Bhk_22.23-2 api prāpya surendra-tvaṃ, kiṃ nu prattaṃ, tvayā ''spadam.
GK19bhattiku:3567: Bhk_22.24-1 tataḥ kathābhiḥ samatītya doṣā- māruhya sainyaiḥ saha puṣpakaṃ te Bhk_22.24-2 samprasthitā vega-vaśāda-gādhaṃ prakṣobhayantaḥ salilaṃ payodheḥ.
GK19bhattiku:3568: Bhk_22.25-1 setuṃ, mahendraṃ, malayaṃ sa-vindhyaṃ, sa-mālyavantaṃ
GK19bhattiku:3570: Bhk_22.25-2 sa-daṇḍakā'raṇya-vātīṃ ca pampāṃ rāmaḥ priyāyāḥ kathayan jagāma.
GK19bhattiku:3571: Bhk_22.26-1 ete te muni-jana-maṇḍitā digantāḥ, śailo'yaṃ lulita-vanaḥ sa
GK19bhattiku:3573: Bhk_22.26-2 gaṅgeyaṃ su-tanu-! viśāla-tīra-ramyā, maithilyā raghu-tanayo
GK19bhattiku:3577: Bhk_22.27-2 ete te su-tanu ! purī-janopabhogyā dṛśyante nayana-manoramā
GK19bhattiku:3579: Bhk_22.28-1 sthānaṃ naḥ pūrva-jānāmiyamadhikamasau preyasī pūrayodhyā,
GK19bhattiku:3581: Bhk_22.28-2 so 'yaṃ deśo, rudantaṃ pura-janamakhilaṃ yatra hitvā prayātau
GK19bhattiku:3582: āvāṃ sīte ! vanā 'ntaṃ saha dhṛta-dhṛtinā lakṣmaṇena kṣapā'nte.
GK19bhattiku:3583: Bhk_22.29-1 tūryāṇāmatha niḥsvanena sakalaṃ lokaṃ samāpūrayan vikrāntaiḥ
GK19bhattiku:3585: Bhk_22.29-2 sā ''nandā 'śru-vilocanaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sahā 'ntaḥ puraḥ samprāpto bharataḥ sa-mārutiralaṃ namraḥ samaṃ mātṛbhiḥ
GK19bhattiku:3590: Bhk_22.31-1 pravidhāya dhṛtiṃ parāṃ janānāṃ yuva-rājaṃ bharataṃ
GK19bhattiku:3592: Bhk_22.31-2 jaghaṭe turagā'dhvareṇa yaṣṭuṃ kṛta-sambhāra-vidhiḥ patiḥ
GK19bhattiku:3596: Bhk_22.32-2 janayati vijayaṃ sadā janānāṃ yudhi susamāhitamaiśvaraṃ yathā
GK19bhattiku:3601: Bhk_22.34-2 hatā dur-meghasaś cā 'smin vidvat-priya-tayā mayā.
GK19bhattiku:3604: Bhk_22.35-2 kīrtirato bhavatān nṛpasya, tasya prema-karaḥ kṣiti-po yataḥ
